chuckeles.sstasker.system

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • chuckeles.sstasker.system.Window

  • public class Window
extends javafx.application.Application
    The SSTasker window mainly for displaying the webview. Singleton.
